This class may be used as either a base class or standalone.

Properties

Protected contextManager

contextManager: ContextManager

Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer.contextManager

  • Defined in davinci-eight/core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:50

The ContextManager to which this consumer is subscribed. The existence of this property indicates a subscription. Therefore, before releasing this reference, be sure to unsubscribe.

  • Inherited from ShareableBase.isZombie

    • Defined in davinci-eight/core/ShareableBase.ts:110

    Returns boolean

render

  • render(ambients: Facet[]): Drawable<G, M>

  • Implementation of AbstractDrawable.render

    • Defined in davinci-eight/core/Drawable.ts:212

    A convenience method for performing all of the methods required for rendering. The following methods are called in order. use() bind() setAmbients(ambients) setUniforms() draw() unbind() In particle simulations it may be useful to call the underlying method directly.

    Parameters

    • ambients: Facet[]

    Returns Drawable<G, M>

Protected setLoggingName

  • setLoggingName(name: string): void

  • Inherited from ShareableBase.setLoggingName

    • Defined in davinci-eight/core/ShareableBase.ts:148

    This method is for use within constructors.

    Immediately after a call to the super class constructor, make a call to setLoggingName. This will have the effect of refining the name used for reporting reference counts.

    This method has the secondary purpose of enabling a tally of the number of classes in the constructor chain. This enables the runtime architecture to verify that destructor chains are consistent with constructor chains, which is a good practice for cleaning up resources.

    Notice that this method is intentionally protected to discourage it from being called outside of the constructor.

    Parameters

    • name: string

      This will usually be set to the name of the class.

    Returns void

  • setUniforms(): Drawable<G, M>

  • Implementation of AbstractDrawable.setUniforms

    • Defined in davinci-eight/core/Drawable.ts:130

    Sets the Material uniforms from the Facets of this composite object, and from Facets stored by the Geometry and Material.

    Returns Drawable<G, M>

subscribe

  • subscribe(contextManager: ContextManager, synchUp: boolean): void

  • Inherited from ShareableContextConsumer.subscribe

    • Defined in davinci-eight/core/ShareableContextConsumer.ts:86

    Instructs the consumer to subscribe to context events.

    This method is idempotent; calling it more than once with the same ContextManager does not change the state.

    Parameters

    • contextManager: ContextManager
    • synchUp: boolean

    Returns void
